en-US.summary: Ask Alexa when to begin your next commute
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to check bus 151 at one one zero eight
Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to set bus 54A at five seven one three
Alexa, ask TransitBuddy to get my bus
en-US.name: TransitBuddy
en-US.updatesDescription: Add support for buses with letters
